meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Resident</kanji> soldiers live in <kanji>barracks</kanji> when they've been <vocabulary>stationed</vocabulary> in another country. They have to serve their <vocabulary>occupancy</vocabulary> for a certain amount of time before they get to go back home.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
